EmailTemplate.subject: CV & interview workshop invite LG YB!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi LG YB!
I hope you are excited for your Easter break!
Jo has fed back to me that you guys would love a CV workshop for your final Youth Board meeting. GOOD NEWS - we have organised one!
I have decided to cancel next Tuesday's LG meeting and instead please all sign up to this fantastic opportunity. See below.
UBM CV & Interview Workshop (www.ubm.com)
UBM IS AN INTERNATIONAL MARKETING AND EVENTS COMPANY WHO CONNECT BUSINESSES TO DIFFERENT AUDIENCES IN MORE THAN 20 COUNTRIES AROUND THE WORLD!
On Thursday 7th April (9.30am - 5.30pm) UBM are offering graduates of the National Citizen Service programme the opportunity to attend their headquarters in South London and be involved in a fantastic workshop. The event will include:
- An introduction from different teams about what they look for when recruiting employees and tips on how to stand out in the application process
- A session on how to create the perfect CV and draft a cover letter â€“ with individual support and guidance from the team
- A 1-2-1 mock interview with a senior level employee with feedback and tips to improve your technique
- This is also a fantastic opportunity to learn more about the events, marketing and communications industry and learn what sort of skills you require to follow a career in these areas.
SIGN UP HERE: http://tcssouthlondon.co.uk/listings/ubm-cv-interview-workshop/
See you guys then! Feel free to email me or give me a call on 07584232766 if you have any questions. I'll be back at work on Tuesday 29th March after the Bank holiday.
Hannah
